definitions: The act of separating into pieces as a result of a blow, shock, or strain.
The act of interrupting a continuous process or sequence.
The act of failing to observe a law, rule, or custom.
The act of making a way through or into something by force.
The act of disclosing or making known something previously secret.
examples: The sound of glass breaking was loud.
He was breaking the rules again.
The news was breaking across all channels.
She was breaking the ice with a joke.
The waves were breaking on the shore.
